xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.mzielinski
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.mzielinski
xwikidoc.content:
## SEARCH AND BROWSE BY SUBJECT TRANSLATION PAGE

## I am making a global assumption that I only need to include strings that are not already covered in classes. To see the lookup strings for the classes, go here. XWiki/GlobalClassTranslation

## If a string has the word "placeholder" after the "=" sign, it means text is coming. If it is blank after the "=" sign, that means the string can be ignored until further notice.

## CONFIGURATION
search.results.max=500

## SEARCH ENTRY BOX AND OVERALL ITEMS

search.text.entry.label=Czegom szukasz?
search.text.entry.button=Szukaj »
search.text.entry.help.link=Pomoc w wyszukiwaniu
search.text.entry.help.title=Uwagi i porady, które pomog? Ci przyspieszy? przeszukiwanie dost?pnych materia?ów

## Tab titles
##{0} is tab name, {1} is search result count, and {2} is the total count
search.tab.title.results={0} ({1})
search.tab.title.resultsmax_exceeds={0} ({2})


## Search Tips Page
search.text.entry.help.text=TBD

search.text.entry.help.button=Pomoc w wyszukiwaniu
search.find.no.results=Nie ma rezultatów spe?niaj?cych twoje kryteria. Spróbuj inaczej sformu?owa? zapytanie.
search.find.no.results.button=OK
search.advanced.search.button=Szukanie zaawansowane

search.columns.menu.columns=Kolumny
search.columns.menu.sort_ascending=Sortuj wyniki - rosn?co
search.columns.menu.sort_descending=Sortuj wyniki - malej?co

search.pagination.pagesize.addbefore=-
search.pagination.pagesize.before=Wyników
search.pagination.pagesize.after=TBD
search.pagination.pagesize.addafter=TBD

search.pagination.displaying.resource=Displaying {0} - {1} Available Resources of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.resource_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Resources {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.group=Displaying Groups {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.group_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Groups {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.member=Displaying Members {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.member_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Members {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.blog=Displaying Blogs {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.blog_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Blogs {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.curriki=Displaying pages {0} - {1} of About {2}
search.pagination.displaying.curriki_resultsmax_exceeds=Displaying Pages {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

## Pagination Buttons
search.pagination.first.button=<<Pocz?tek
search.pagination.prev.button=<Poprzednia
search.pagination.next.button=Nast?pna> 
search.pagination.last.button=Koniec>>

search.pagination.beforepage=Strona
